title: Help about these Boards
body:
I post a question but it never showed up.  so I shall again.

When I was trying to ask a question in the Gameplay board I saw that it says you need to be a level 7 to post.  Level 7 what??  in the game, if so, and if I am looking at the right number I am at level 10 so why can't I post?
Also from a newbie stand point, the whole point of a discussion board for a game is to post questions to help ones understanding of the game so why even have a level restriction for creating posts??

replies.body: When you post for the first time, the boards has to grab your account and sync up to the site.  It looks that you're post here has made that update, and now showing as level 10.  Everything looks okay now!
